page.title: 16SHOPPING IN BAPCHILD
page.content: Bapchild is a small village located on the A2 one mile east of Sitting- bourne. Shopping facilities are limited but two stores deserve mention. Bapchild Farm Stall is a small shop on a prime site by the A2. It offers parking space to drivers wishing to purchase goods. The shop sells fruit and vegetables, much of which is produced by the local farms owned by Mr Gascoyne. Open daily, the shop is very busy most of the time, especially in June when it is selling strawberries. Bapchild Stores is also situated on the A2 but on the opposite side of the road. The shop contains the sub-post office for the area. At the moment the shop is owned by Mr Townsend whose son attends the school.
